newsitem.title: USA: LPC-Four banks lending Avis Inc $2.25 bln -sources.
newsitem.headline: LPC-Four banks lending Avis Inc $2.25 bln -sources.

text.p: NEW YORK, Aug 23 (LPC) - Bank of New York, BankAmerica Corp, Chase Manhattan Bank and NationsBank Corp next week will begin syndicating a $2.25 billion bank loan for Avis Inc, market sources said.
The deal, which will refinance the rental car company's fleet debt, will be structured as a 364-day facility, sources added.
The bank loan is a result of HFS Inc's plan to acquire the employee-owned rental car business, according to bankers.
Once HFS completes the acquisition in a transaction estimated at $800 million, it will spin off Avis to its shareholders, but will retain ownership of the Avis name, sources said.
